Posts.EditableText: What difference does it make if the player is a scenery type or not?
Posts.HTML: What difference does it make if the player is a scenery type or not?

Posts.EditableText: Probably not much difference now. I think I probably initially made the player scenery so they wouldn't appear in room descriptions, but I think that other code will take care of that now, so this attribute can be removed.
